title: OgNasty
author: OgNasty
created_time: May 07, 2022, 09:33:51 PMLast edit: May 28, 2022, 11:30:50 PM by OgNasty
content: Apollo BTC - A Bitcoin ASIC Miner!I am willing to sell one FutureBit Apollo BTC miner (USB controlled via a computer, no PSU).  This miner is currently sold out on the manufacturer website.  For more information click the link below or see the "Features" of this miner.I am able to ship immediately and am asking $549 in Bitcoin or if you prefer, ETH/MATIC/mSAND/MANA/DOGE.PM me if interested.  Thanks!(not actual image of miner box, but indistinguishable from item being sold)https://shop.futurebit.io/products/pre-order-apollo-btc-a-bitcoin-asic-miner-and-desktop-class-computer-running-a-full-node-and-much-more-batch-1-ships-in-late-april-to-may?variant=33404666347619Features: Very wide range of operation modes with preset ECO (quiet) mode, BALANCED, and TURBO mode. 2-3.8 TH/s of SHA256 performance per miner (+/- 5%)125 Watts in ECO mode, and 200 Watts in TURBO * +/- 10%Clocks and Power is fully customizable by user with easy to use interfaceHashboard now monitors both voltage and power draw for accurate measurements*Custom designed cold forged hexagonal pin heatsink with leading thermal performance for the quietest ASIC miner in operation!1k-5k RPM Quiet Dual Ball Bearing Fan with automatic thermal management with onboard temperature sensorTwo Six Pin PCIE power connectors for wide-range of power drawCustom Designed all Aluminum caseShips with our own custom built 200W 94% efficient PSU and is ready to run out of the box! (Does NOT come with Standard package).

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Price lowered.  I'd point out that these are sold out on their site, so this is the fastest way to get your hands on one of these silent 'built for home use' miners.  If you're looking to dump your Bitcoin in this latest crash and want to start mining, this is a great opportunity to do so.  Also willing to listen to offers if you think this price is too high, but I'm definitely not interested in selling for a discount below the retail price, given that these miners sell out every batch so there is clearly demand.  Shoot me a message if you're interested and we can try to work out a deal.  Good luck!

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Price dropped again...  With these being sold out so fast on the website there's clearly demand for them.  The cheapest one is selling on eBay currently for $900...  I'd rather deal in straight crypto but there's a lot of room in there for profit if someone wanted to take a risk and try to resell this for dollars on eBay or wherever people are selling things online these days.  I have multiple of them, which is why I'm selling one.  There's nothing wrong with it or anything.  Let me know if anyone has any questions.BTC to the moon!

comments.author: Sledge0001
comments.body: Need to add this to my every growing hardware list!

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.created_time: May 25, 2022, 11:29:01 PMLast edit: May 26, 2022, 04:22:58 PM by OgNasty
comments.body: One sold.  I have one left...  Feel free to make me an offer and the coins I'm willing to accept are listed in the original post.  If you have any questions let me know.  This miner is currently operating with no issues on slush's pool at 3TH/s.  It's nearly silent and in a room with GPU miners I can't even tell it's there.    Thanks for looking!~~~~PRICE DROPPED~~~~

comments.author: Sledge0001
comments.body: Wish I would have known you wanted to sell both!!!DM'ing you!

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Quote from: Sledge0001 on May 27, 2022, 03:40:32 AMWish I would have known you wanted to sell both!!!DM'ing you!This miner has now been sold so I am locking the thread.  Thanks to everyone who inquired and thanks to Sledge0001 for stepping up to purchase it.  I really liked these miners and they were as small and silent as you'd expect.  With the heat stepping up already in the desert, it just made sense for me to sell them.  Great miners though for the at home hobbyist.
